name: raven-js

scripts.loader: cat src/loader.js | sed '/build_marker/{N;d;}' | npx google-closure-compiler-js | perl -e "print ';'; print <STDIN>;"
scripts.test: grunt build.test && npm run test:unit && npm run test:loader && npm run test:integration && npm run test:typescript
scripts.test:ci: grunt test:ci && npm run test:loader-sauce && npm run test:integration-sauce
scripts.test:size: grunt dist && bundlesize && git checkout -- dist/
